gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Timberwolves 112, Heat 108
gameRecap.excerpt: The Timberwolves rally from 17-points down to defeat the Heat, 112-108. Anthony Edwards led the way with 32 points (10 in 4th quarter), eight rebounds and five assists for the Timberwolves, while Karl-Anthony Towns added 18 points and eight rebounds in the victory. Tyler Herro tallied 25 points for the Heat in the losing effort. The Timberwolves improve to 20-5 on the season, while the Heat fall to 15-12.
